channel.title: How would I make an object disappear with a timer [PI]
channel.description: I'm making a mini-game, and I need an object to disappear 30seconds after the event starts.

item.title: How would I make an object disappear with a timer [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

Can you be more clear, like i think i might have a idea of what you are trying to do.
Eg. Your player starts in a spot and there is a object gate and your trying to give it a timer where after a few seconds the gate disapears and you continue the minigame?

Read full topic
item.source: How would I make an object disappear with a timer [PI]
